electricity.name: Electricity
electricity.description: The most basic resource, used at almost every level.

water.name: Water
water.description: The most common fluid. Used to wash, suspend, or react.

coal.name: Coal
coal.description: A mineral uniquely suited for burning. Replaced by other techniques later.

carbon.name: Carbon
carbon.description: The chemical foundation for most biology and much chemistry.

steel_ingot.name: Steel Ingot
steel_ingot.description: Iron bonded with other elements, mostly carbon, for strength.

iron_gear.name: Iron Gear
iron_gear.description: A mechanical part made of iron.

steel_gear.name: Steel Gear
steel_gear.description: A mechanical part made of steel.

bornite.name: Bornite
bornite.description: Copper ore, ready to be refined.

bauxite.name: Bauxite
bauxite.description: Aluminum ore, ready to be refined.

native_gold.name: Native Gold
native_gold.description: Gold ore, disappointingly hard to find, but important.

aluminum_ingot.name: Aluminum Ingot
aluminum_ingot.description: For when low density is important in a metal.

gold_ingot.name: Gold Ingot
gold_ingot.description: An electric conductor that happens to have celestial importance.

steel.name: Steel
steel.description: Iron bonded with other elements, mostly carbon, for strength.

sand.name: Sand
sand.description: Mixed minerals making a course powder.

salt.name: Salt
salt.description: Sodium chloride, commonly found making up a few % of oceans.

holy_water.name: Holy Water
holy_water.description: Water that draws the attention of the divine.

starsand.name: Starsand
starsand.description: Sand that now resembles the night sky.

starglass.name: Starglass
starglass.description: Glass with new and unreplicable properties.

hellsteel.name: Hellsteel
hellsteel.description: Misnamed blend of iron and infernal power, but not hell.

profane_ingot.name: Profane Ingot
profane_ingot.description: That you felt you needed to make this is the true tragedy.

divine_dust.name: Divine Dust
divine_dust.description: While attention is important, this can draw angels themselves.

pure_dust.name: Pure Dust
pure_dust.description: A mixture of solids that seems opinionated about other materials.

heavy_dust.name: Heavy Dust
heavy_dust.description: A mixture of solids that is far more dense than it should be.

corrupted_dust.name: Corrupted Dust
corrupted_dust.description: The might of the divine, given to those of lesser intent.

ascendant_dust.name: Ascendant Dust
ascendant_dust.description: Dust given the attention of something else, not infernal, not divine.

arcane_dust.name: Arcane Dust
arcane_dust.description: A mixture that can bend the universe, maybe break it.

gilded_dust.name: Gilded Dust
gilded_dust.description: It says it's expensive, shows it's worthless, and then proves priceless.

galliantium.name: Galliantium
galliantium.description: A metal empowered by more fundamental undercurrents of the universe.
